cookie.title: Cookie Preferences
cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. Please choose your preferences below.
cookie.modalMessage: We use cookies to provide essential website functionality, improve your experience and analyze our traffic with analytics tools. Here you can customize your consent preferences for different cookie categories.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are required for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as live chat and other embedded content.
